message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this price reflects the value it holds.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,500 for the product.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the product's value to you is substantial. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,800 for the product. This price aligns more closely with my current budget while still acknowledging the value of the item.
